scripts.wdio:test: npm run pretest && npm run wdio:run
scripts.wdio:test_with_params: npm run pretest && npm run wido_with_params
scripts.wido_with_params: npx cross-env hostname=https://the-internet.herokuapp.com url=/login wdio run wdio.conf.ts
scripts.cucumber_wdio:test: npm run pretest && npm run wdio_cucumber:run
scripts.cucumber_wdio:test_with_params: npm run pretest && npm run cucumber_wido_with_params
scripts.smoke_cucumber_wdio:test_with_params: npm run pretest && npm run smoke_cucumber_wido_with_params
scripts.regression_cucumber_wdio:test_with_param: npm run pretest && npm run regression_cucumber_wido_with_params
scripts.wdio_cuc_su:run: npm run pretest && npm run wdio_cucumber:run
scripts.wdio_api_su:run: npm run pretest && npm run wdio_api:run
scripts.cucumber_wido_with_params: npx cross-env hostname=https://the-internet.herokuapp.com url=/login wdio run wdio.conf.e2e.ts
scripts.regression_cucumber_wido_with_params: npx cross-env hostname=https://the-internet.herokuapp.com url=/login wdio run wdio.conf.e2e.ts --suite regression
scripts.smoke_cucumber_wido_with_params: npx cross-env hostname=https://the-internet.herokuapp.com url=/login wdio run wdio.conf.e2e.ts --suite smoke
